Here is the list of zodiac signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 8.5/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and materialistic.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Curious and adaptable, but can be scattered and unpredictable.
4. Cancer - 7.5/10 - Nurturing and emotional, but can be moody and overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful and dominating.
6. Virgo - 9.5/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8.5/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9.5/10 - Passionate and intense, but can be secretive and vengeful.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be blunt and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 7.5/10 - Disciplined and ambitious, but can be rigid and critical.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but can be rebellious and detached.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Compassionate and imaginative, but can be dreamy and unrealistic.
